description: Maps the track file (*.trk) output of 3dTrackID to another space using the 1Dmatrix_save info of 3dAllineate.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for the output track file.

in_trk.title: Input track file
in_trk.description: The name of the *.trk file to be mapped.

in_map.title: Input map file
in_map.description: Single line of matrix values for the transformation.

reference.title: Reference file
reference.description: 3D data set in the space to which the TRK file is being mapped.

orig_zero.title: Zero origin
orig_zero.description: Put (0,0,0) as the origin in the output *.trk file.

line_only_num.title: Line only numbers
line_only_num.description: If your 1D_MATR file is just 12 numbers in a row.

already_inv.title: Already inverted transformation
already_inv.description: If you have inverted the mapping or use another program than 3dAllineate.
